Reviews.Title: Terrible Resolution
Reviews.Author: Frugal
Reviews.Content: Coleman Duo 2V7WP-P 14 Megapixel Waterproof Digital Camera (Purple)I bought this camera to take with me kayak fishing.  Not one single picture I have taken with it has been clear.  I have tried it indoors, and outdoors in perfect conditions.  My cell phone takes much better pictures.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: Blueribbon
Reviews.Content: Double view screens really nice to have.  Also being weather proof is something I need while I'm riding the motorcycle.  Don't have to worry about a little rain ruining the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0 Mega Pixels Max Resolution Waterproof up to 10 ft - no additional case needed!
Large 2.7" back LCD Screen. Also features a 1.8" front LCD
Camera features a built-in 120 Degree wide angle lens and takes video in VGA mode
8x digital zoom; shock resistant to 3.2ft
Includes camera pouch, 2 AAA batteries, wrist strap, USB cable, instruction manual, image editing CD and 1 year warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Coleman Duo 2V7WP-P 14 Megapixel Waterproof Digital Camera (Purple)
